title: My Trip to Jeju Island
description: Read about someone's vacation experience in Jeju Island.

passage.text:
Last summer, I went on a trip to Jeju Island with my family. We flew from Seoul, and the flight took about an hour. It was my first time on an airplane, so I was very excited.

We stayed at a hotel near the beach for five days. The room had a beautiful view of the ocean. Every morning, we had breakfast at the hotel restaurant.

During our trip, we visited many places. We saw Seongsan Ilchulbong, a famous volcanic crater. We also went to a waterfall called Cheonjiyeon. The water was so clear and beautiful!

On our last day, we rented bicycles and rode along the coast. The weather was perfect - sunny but not too hot. We ate fresh seafood for dinner at a local restaurant.

I had such a wonderful time in Jeju. I want to go back again next year. It is definitely my favorite vacation destination.
